articles.title: Cracker Barrel expects fewer patrons after failed logo rebrand - The Washington Post
articles.description: The restaurant chain warned investors it expects reduced traffic this year, after recently reversing a logo change that drew criticism for being “woke.”

articles.title: Spirit CEO says struggling airline will slash flights, braces employees for more job cuts - CNBC
articles.description: Spirit is slashing its November schedule by 25% and is bracing staff for more job cuts.

articles.title: S&P 500 Heads Lower as Rally Reverses After Fed Decision - Barron's
articles.description: The Dow rose while the S&P 500 and Nasdaq fell Wednesday as the stock market stalled after the Federal Reserve's rate cut.

articles.title: US to invest £150bn in UK, promising thousands of jobs - BBC
articles.description: The UK government is calling this the largest commercial deal of its kind and expects it to create more than 7,600 "high-quality jobs".

articles.title: Ben & Jerry's co-founder Jerry Greenfield resigns over dispute with owner Unilever - NPR
articles.description: Greenfield said the Vermont ice cream maker "has been silenced, sidelined for fear of upsetting those in power" by Unilever, the multinational corporation that bought Ben & Jerry's in 2000.

articles.title: Tesla Is Redesigning Door Handles That Drew Safety Scrutiny - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Tesla Inc. is working on a redesign of its door handles, which have drawn scrutiny over safety incidents that trapped passengers inside their vehicles.

articles.title: Cracker Barrel stock falls as company reports mixed earnings after rebrand controversy - CNBC
articles.description: Cracker Barrel reported fourth-quarter earnings after the bell on Wednesday.

articles.title: China tells its tech companies they can’t buy AI chips from Nivida - TechCrunch
articles.description: After strongly discouraging tech companies from buying Nivdia's AI chips in August, the country is now banning the practice outright.

articles.title: Elizabeth Warren says there's a hidden reason why Trump wants to end companies' quarterly earnings requirement - Business Insider
articles.description: "It undermines transparency," Sen. Elizabeth Warren said of Trump's proposal. "That is the whole point here."

articles.title: New Trump appointee Miran calls for half-point cut in only dissent as rest of Fed bands together - CNBC
articles.description: Newly confirmed Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran dissented from the central bank's decision.

articles.title: ICYMI: Mortgage Rates Fall to Three-Year Low - The White House (.gov)
articles.description: Mortgage rates have fallen to their lowest levels in three years, making the third straight week of declines as President Donald J. Trump continues to

articles.title: Trump crashes the Fed's consensus - Politico
articles.description: The threat of stagflation means the risk of getting the policy wrong is high for Powell — and no less so for Trump, whose presidency could ride on the outcome.
